arcade.env.comp

Class GraphSites.SiteEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.util.Graph.Edge
      • arcade.env.comp.GraphSites.SiteEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    GraphSites

    public static class GraphSites.SiteEdge
extends Graph.Edge
    Extension of Graph.Edge for site edges.

    Node tracks additional hemodynamic properties including radius, length, wall thickness, shear stress, circumferential stress, and volumetric flow rate.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double area
      Cross-sectional area of edge (in um2)
      double circum
      Circumferential stress in edge (in mmHg)

        public java.lang.String toJSON()
